Shivah::

Shivah looked the drones, thanks a screen of his computer and he 
smelled a tramp.

"What are doing those drones there, mutant-wolf?" said Shivah


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine stood tall in his robot mode holding the vial of the 
alleged
> antivirus. Two of Veratis' drones hovered next to him one on each 
side.
> Claws extended from each one trying to look intimidateing. 
Lunarpine knew
> that the only way the drones would have time to do any damage is if 
the
> opponent was pinned down. It was to his advantage that the 
Predacons didn't
> know that. All scans would show that they weren't designed for 
combat but if
> the Preds were anxious to be a nuiscance then he'd be equally as 
annoying.
> "You want the cure?" The former Maximal paused a dramatic 
pause. "Come out
> and get it."
